pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, April 11, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Greater Victoria, British Columbia

Private meetings

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement highlighting Budget 2022 investments in electric vehicle infrastructure. A media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Victoria, Lisa Helps.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the City of Victoria Youth Advisory Council.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

Media appearance

8:05 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on CFAX 1070’s Mornings with Al Ferraby.
